tool_description: Sentiment analysis, break into words, break into sentences.
name: Text Analysis
title: Text Analysis

api_list.name: break-into-sentences
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-analysis20.p.rapidapi.com/break-into-sentences"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-analysis20.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
